projects.title: T-xray Classification
projects.bodyText: Thorax X-ray image view classification with convolutional neural networks. This work was done as part of my thesis program and it was awarded a prize for being the best in Bioingeering at the university in 2022.

projects.title: Decision support system for the detection of lung oppacities in T-xray
projects.bodyText: Lung oppacities are spots inside the lungs where oxygen is not present while normally breathing. Lung oppacities can be challenging to detect due to T-xray variability and the lack of preparation of most professionals in charge of detecting them. A decision support system was developed, to help those professionals with the thorax x-ray analysis.

projects.title: Basic Statistical Analysis
projects.bodyText: R-shiny app developed for the fast frequentist statistical analysis of small to medium size datasets. It asseses column types, missign values, normality of continuous variables by graphical and numerical tests and compares ODDS ratios for categorical variables.

projects.title: Docx Equation Handler
projects.bodyText: Web app designed accept a .docx with equations in it (in equation object tag) and extract the simple ones to make them part of a text.

projects.title: MVVM Sample App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that loads data from mock API and show in both **LinearLayout** and **GridLayout RecyclerView**.
 - Offline support using **Room** DB and **NetworkBoundResource**.
 - Uses the **MVVM** architecture.

projects.title: Feed List App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that loads list of feeds from a **paginated** API and shows in a RecyclerView.
 - Uses the **MVVM** architecture.
 - Uses **Paging 3** library along with other Architecture Components.

projects.title: Task Tracker
projects.bodyText:
- A simple Task Tracker web app made with **Angular 12**.
 - Uses **mock JSON server** to get, add, delete or update tasks.

projects.title: Image Encryption/Decryption
projects.bodyText:
- A Web App for Image Encryption and Decryption made in **Django**.
 - Uses **SDES** algorithm for encryption/decryption.
